Verify the 'Settings' link displays font size 16px, font family 'Inter', and text color #adb5bd
Verify the sidebar has box shadow '2px 0 5px rgba(0,0,0,0.1)'
Verify the 'Logout' button is at the bottom, offset from the bottom by 20px, and clickable
Verify the navigation items have row gap 8px
Verify the sidebar has min height equal to the viewport height
Verify the sidebar's opacity is 1.0
Verify the 'User Profile' section inside the sidebar has border-bottom 1px solid rgba(255,255,255,0.1)'
Open a product page with a carousel
Verify the carousel container has width 800px, height 450px, and overflow-x 'hidden'
Verify the current product image 'product_main.jpg' is displayed
Verify the left and right navigation arrows are visible, positioned vertically centered, and have background color rgba(0,0,0,0.5)
Verify each arrow SVG has fill color #ffffff and cursor 'pointer'
Verify the carousel auto-advances every 5 seconds (5000ms)
Verify the pagination dots below the carousel show exactly 4 dots, with the active dot having background color #007bff
Verify the carousel applies a 'scale(1.02)' transformation to the active image
Verify the carousel images have object-fit 'contain'
Verify the carousel container has border radius 10px
